forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 59, with temperatures falling to around 56 in the afternoon. North northwest wind around 8 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 43. North wind 3 to 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the afternoon basks in a tranquil embrace of sunshine, the kind that casts soft shadows upon the vibrant cityscape and comfortably warms the air. As the hours inch towards evening, the temperature dances lightly between 56 and 59 degrees, accompanied by a gentle north-northwest breeze whispering at about 8 mph. The horizon offers a clear view, unmarred by fog or the usual silhouette of the marine layer that often graces the bay. Tonight, the clouds will gather softly, unveiling a cooler 43 degrees as the night settles in, with winds calming to a mere breath.

For those wandering the streets this afternoon, a lightweight jacket or sweater may serve well against the chill that may nudge at exposed skin, while comfortable shoes beckon for a stroll. A walk through Golden Gate Park could be a perfect escape, allowing one to immerse themselves in the serene beauty of the surroundings. Alternatively, the thriving café scene offers an inviting respite, where one might enjoy a warm beverage and watch the day slowly transition into night, embracing the stillness that follows the bustling city sounds.
